title: 10 Best Firefox Add-ons for Android To Ensure Privacy
description:
If you remember, I said this in my live q&a, I’ve talked about the concept of having 2 browsers. 1st is chrome obviously, for regular work, and second is customized version of Firefox, which I’ll use for 
private browsing.

Top 10 FireFox Extension you should Try

Phony
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/phony/

uBlock origin
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/ublock-origin/?src=search

YouTube Background Playback Fix
https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/video-background-play-fix/

Three Finger Swipe
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/three-finger-swipe/?src=search

HTTPS Everywhere
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/https-everywhere/?src=search

video speed controller 
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/videospeed/?src=search

YouTube to MP3 Converter
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/youtube-to-mp3-converter-ytmp3/?src=search

Dark Background and Light Text
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/dark-background-light-text/?src=search

Social Fixer
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/socialfixer/?src=search

Self-Destructing Cookies 
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/self-destructing-cookies/?src=search
